skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I specialize in building responsive, user-friendly frontend experiences using React, JavaScript, and modern UI/UX practices. With expertise in HTML, CSS, Javascript and React, I create seamless, engaging web

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Experienced in backend development with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, I specialize in building scalable APIs, optimizing performance, and ensuring seamless integration with front-end technologies for robust user experiences.

skills.title: Wordpress
skills.description: Proficient in WordPress development, I specialize in creating custom themes, plugins, and optimizing website performance, ensuring responsive designs, seamless user experiences, and scalable solutions for diverse needs.

portfolio.title: DevLabs
portfolio.description: DevLabs is a developer community platform designed to enhance coding collaboration and learning. It offers features like problem posting, solution sharing, an article section with rich text editor, and a course library manage by admin. Users can also search for jobs with map-based navigation, manage profiles, and brainstorm on a digital whiteboard.

portfolio.title: IMGEN
portfolio.description: IMGEN is a web app where user can generate Ai Images by giving prompt ,and there is a community showcase of image generated by Ai by different users

portfolio.title: ChatFusion
portfolio.description: ChatFusion is chatapp with user friendly interface ,i used socketio for making the communication between end users real time, users can search other users, and can change profile picture

portfolio.title: TaskGrid
portfolio.description: TaskGrid is an advance todo which gives the user ease to drag and drop the task to update the status of the task (TODO,IN PROGRESS,COMPLETED),user have to do authentication process in order to use the app
